{"id":917781441,"question_id":2665,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1679190766,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"209 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/917781441/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Time to Repair Cars","memory":"53.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool chk(vector<int>&ranks, int cars, long long m){\n        long long tmp = 0;\n        for(auto k: ranks) tmp += int(sqrt(m / k));\n        return tmp >= cars;\n    }\n    long long repairCars(vector<int>& ranks, int cars) {\n        long long l = 1, r = 1e18, m, ans;\n        while(l <= r){\n            m = l + (r - l) / 2;\n            if(chk(ranks, cars, m)){\n                ans = m;\n                r = m - 1;\n            }else l = m + 1;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-time-to-repair-cars","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
